docs.lead_paragraph: MOST Americans would probably be intensely surprised to find, in their morning newspaper, headlines such as this one:

headline.main: Uncle Sam's Welfare Program -- For the Rich; Welfare program -- for the rich

docs.abstract: P M Stern article on Fed income tax loopholes cites cases of how rich avoid paying taxes; uses figures from Brookings Inst study to back results; notes J P Getty, who earns $100-million annually, pays no more than few thousand dollars in taxes; Getty illus; cites loopholes for wealthy individuals in capital gains tax, tax-deductible mortgage interest and inheritance tax laws; drawing
